Sentencas: To evaluate the suitability of the Co-29Cr-6Mo alloy as an interconnect in solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), the oxidation behaviour of Co-29Cr-6Mo alloys with various Si concentrations was investigated in air at 700-1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Effects of alloyed Si on the oxidation behaviour of Co-29Cr-6Mo alloy for solid-oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The presence of alloyed Si improved the oxide-scale adhesion by promoting the formation of a continuous Cr2O3 film.
Titulo: Effects of alloyed Si on the oxidation behaviour of Co-29Cr-6Mo alloy for solid-oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The SiO2 particles in the inner layer and the grain boundaries of alloy matrix beneath the inner layer inhibited the inward oxygen diffusion and outward chromium diffusion.
Titulo: Effects of alloyed Si on the oxidation behaviour of Co-29Cr-6Mo alloy for solid-oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The results indicate that the Co-29Cr-6Mo alloy with added Si is appropriate for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Effects of alloyed Si on the oxidation behaviour of Co-29Cr-6Mo alloy for solid-oxide fuel cell interconnects
